https://tmrev.io/movie/242546-Bayonetta: Bloody Fate 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dfg7dqm0YX16D6QYDKDdh3Qi930.jpg Based on the 2009 video game, Bayonetta: Bloody Fate follows the story of the titular heroine, an ancient witch who awakens from a five hundred-year slumber with no memory of her life. Armed with a gun in each limb, Bayonetta embarks on a journey to rediscover her past, defeating all bloodthirsty angels that stand in her way. Bayonetta: Bloody Fate
